1. [UFC Events in 1993](https://graphhub.net/ufc/list/ufc-events-in-1993?id=EVENTS_YEAR_1993) (list:EVENTS_YEAR_1993)
   - Description: List of the UFC Events that took place in [1993](https://graphhub.net/ufc/concept/1993?id=YEAR_1993) includes three events held in the state of [Colorado](https://graphhub.net/ufc/concept/colorado?id=STATE_5), United States. UFC 1, held on November 12, [1993](https://graphhub.net/ufc/concept/1993?id=YEAR_1993), marked the inaugural event of the Ultimate Fighting Championship. It took place at [McNichols Sports Arena](https://graphhub.net/ufc/concept/mcnichols-sports-arena?id=VENUE_137) in Denver. UFC 2 and UFC 3 were held on March 11, [1994](https://graphhub.net/ufc/concept/1994?id=YEAR_1994), and September 9, [1994](https://graphhub.net/ufc/concept/1994?id=YEAR_1994), respectively, at [Mammoth Gardens](https://graphhub.net/ufc/concept/mammoth-gardens?id=VENUE_130) in Denver. These events showcased early mixed martial arts fights, featuring various disciplines and minimal rules.

The first event took place on October 1, [2005](https://graphhub.net/ufc/concept/2005?id=YEAR_2005), at the [Capital One Arena.](https://graphhub.net/ufc/concept/capital-one-arena?id=VENUE_51) Notable fights include [UFC Live: Cruz vs. Johnson](https://graphhub.net/ufc/concept/ufc-live-cruz-vs-johnson?id=EVENT_185) on October 1, [2011](https://graphhub.net/ufc/concept/2011?id=YEAR_2011), and UFC on Versus: Jones vs. Matyushenko on August 1, [2010](https://graphhub.net/ufc/concept/2010?id=YEAR_2010), both held at the [Capital One Arena.](https://graphhub.net/ufc/concept/capital-one-arena?id=VENUE_51) The city has also seen events at the [Verizon Center](https://graphhub.net/ufc/concept/verizon-center?id=VENUE_244) and the Entertainment and Sports Arena.

1. [Wells Fargo Center](https://graphhub.net/ufc/concept/wells-fargo-center?id=VENUE_249) (concept:VENUE_249)
   - Description: The [Wells Fargo Center](https://graphhub.net/ufc/concept/wells-fargo-center?id=VENUE_249), located in Philadelphia, [Pennsylvania](https://graphhub.net/ufc/concept/pennsylvania?id=STATE_38), is a prominent venue for UFC events. With a seating capacity of over 19,500, the [Wells Fargo Center](https://graphhub.net/ufc/concept/wells-fargo-center?id=VENUE_249) provides a spacious and electrifying atmosphere for fans to witness thrilling mixed martial arts action.

1. [Wembley Arena](https://graphhub.net/ufc/concept/wembley-arena?id=VENUE_250) (concept:VENUE_250)
   - Description: [Wembley Arena](https://graphhub.net/ufc/concept/wembley-arena?id=VENUE_250), located in London, England, has hosted several notable UFC events. In [2002](https://graphhub.net/ufc/concept/2002?id=YEAR_2002), UFC 38 took place at the venue, featuring a welterweight championship bout between Matt Hughes and Carlos Newton. Additionally, UFC 85 in [2008](https://graphhub.net/ufc/concept/2008?id=YEAR_2008) showcased a middleweight clash between Nate Marquardt and Thales Leites. With a seating capacity of 12,500, [Wembley Arena](https://graphhub.net/ufc/concept/wembley-arena?id=VENUE_250) continues to be a popular choice for UFC events in the United Kingdom.

1. [Wisconsin](https://graphhub.net/ufc/concept/wisconsin?id=STATE_49) (concept:STATE_49)
   - Description: [Wisconsin](https://graphhub.net/ufc/concept/wisconsin?id=STATE_49), a state in the Midwestern region of the United States, has hosted one UFC event to date. On June 23, [2007](https://graphhub.net/ufc/concept/2007?id=YEAR_2007), [UFC 72: Victory](https://graphhub.net/ufc/concept/ufc-72-victory?id=EVENT_92) took place at the [Bradley Center](https://graphhub.net/ufc/concept/bradley-center?id=VENUE_43) in Milwaukee. The event featured notable fighters such as Rich Franklin, Yushin Okami, and Jason MacDonald. While [Wisconsin](https://graphhub.net/ufc/concept/wisconsin?id=STATE_49) has not been a frequent host for UFC events, the [Bradley Center](https://graphhub.net/ufc/concept/bradley-center?id=VENUE_43) served as the primary venue for this memorable fight night.

1. [Wyoming](https://graphhub.net/ufc/concept/wyoming?id=STATE_50) (concept:STATE_50)
   - Description: [Wyoming](https://graphhub.net/ufc/concept/wyoming?id=STATE_50), a state in the western United States, has hosted one UFC event to date. On November 18, [2017](https://graphhub.net/ufc/concept/2017?id=YEAR_2017), the UFC made its debut in [Wyoming](https://graphhub.net/ufc/concept/wyoming?id=STATE_50) at the [Casper Events Center](https://graphhub.net/ufc/concept/casper-events-center?id=VENUE_53) in Casper. The event, [UFC Fight Night: Poirier vs. Pettis](https://graphhub.net/ufc/concept/ufc-fight-night-poirier-vs-pettis?id=EVENT_420), featured a main event bout between Dustin Poirier and Anthony Pettis. This marked the first and only UFC event held in [Wyoming](https://graphhub.net/ufc/concept/wyoming?id=STATE_50) thus far.
   - Owner of Lists: [UFC Events in Wyoming](https://graphhub.net/ufc/list/ufc-events-in-wyoming?id=EVENTS_STATE_50)

1. [Zagreb, Croatia](https://graphhub.net/ufc/concept/zagreb-croatia?id=LOCATION_118) (concept:LOCATION_118)
   - Description: Zagreb, [Croatia](https://graphhub.net/ufc/concept/croatia?id=COUTRY_9), has been a host to several UFC events. The city's first UFC event, [UFC Fight Night: Rothwell vs. dos Santos](https://graphhub.net/ufc/concept/ufc-fight-night-rothwell-vs-dos-santos?id=EVENT_355), took place on April 10, [2016](https://graphhub.net/ufc/concept/2016?id=YEAR_2016), at the Zagreb Arena. The main event featured a heavyweight bout between Ben Rothwell and Junior dos Santos. Zagreb has since witnessed other UFC events, including [UFC Fight Night: Lewis vs. Hunt](https://graphhub.net/ufc/concept/ufc-fight-night-lewis-vs-hunt?id=EVENT_403) on June 10, [2017](https://graphhub.net/ufc/concept/2017?id=YEAR_2017), and [UFC Fight Night: Cowboy vs. Till](https://graphhub.net/ufc/concept/ufc-fight-night-cowboy-vs-till?id=EVENT_417) on October 21, [2017](https://graphhub.net/ufc/concept/2017?id=YEAR_2017), both held at the [Arena Zagreb.](https://graphhub.net/ufc/concept/arena-zagreb?id=VENUE_22)
   - Owner of Lists: [UFC Events in Zagreb, Croatia](https://graphhub.net/ufc/list/ufc-events-in-zagreb-croatia?id=EVENTS_LOCATION_118)
